title: Consumer sentiment rises, September inflation data rose as expected
description: Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) data, the Federal Reserve's preferred measure of inflation, showed inflation rose in September, but about in line...
content: We got some breaking news now crossing the wire. We've got PCE, personal consumption expenditures coming in in line with estimates. This is for September, remember, so rising 3/10th of 1% on a month … [+4969 chars]
